cu.explanation_en: Setting hw_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause hardware log configuration parsing failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting pusch_AntennaPorts to 16 exceeds the valid range (typically 1-8) and will cause antenna port configuration errors leading to uplink transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pusch_AntennaPorts 設定為 16 超過有效範圍（通常為 1-8），會導致天線埠配置錯誤並造成上行鏈路傳輸失敗。
